short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight all headlines within the document.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlights all headlines (<h1> ... <h6> tags) on the current page. The headlines will get a hint with the tag name.

This extension can be used to visualize the headlines for quick SEO testing.
